mapper.select: select c.cart_no ,c.member_no ,c.quantity ,c.product_no ,p.product_name ,p.product_price ,p.product_img ,p.category ,p.discount_pct from cart c inner join product p on c.product_no = p.product_no where c.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_no, quantity, product_no, member_no) values (cart_no.nextval, #{quantity}, #{productNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where cart_no = #{cartNo}
